titles.title: To stop the growth of insolvent thrift institutions.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 7/14/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Federal Home Loan Bank Board should adopt and enforce a program for stopping the growth of deposits and other secured borrowing at insolvent savings and loan associations insured by the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corporation.
